mapper.update: update admin_tbl set last_date = sysdate where admin_id = #{admin_id}
update admin_tbl set admin_pw = #{admin_pw} where admin_id = #{admin_id}

select nvl(count(board_num),0) from board_tbl where board_reply = 'N'
select nvl(count(faq_num),0) from faq_tbl where faq_ref = 0 and TO_CHAR(faq_writedate,'yyyy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')
select nvl(count(order_code),0) from order_tbl where TO_CHAR(order_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy/mm/dd')
